### Bid Requirements

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites qualified vendors to submit a bid to provide Media Relations Training for CFIA Spokespeople. The training program will include personalization of existing web-based interactive training, course materials, a course syllabus, and delivery of the course.

The winning bidder will be required to:

* Provide customized media relations training to CFIA spokespeople
* Develop course materials and a course syllabus
* Deliver the course to CFIA spokespeople

The bid submission should include:

* A detailed proposal outlining the bidder's understanding of the requirements and their approach to delivering the training program
* A timeline for completion of the project
* A breakdown of costs and services included in the bid
